"For the purpose of the costume of atten:
"Halloween is here again!
This year, for the purpose of the party, I have gotten
the assistance of all the ARKS! At this juncture, without
further ado, I have a request from you! Besides the
costumes this year, I also like to pay more attention to
the movements. If you have any movements of the
enemy, I would like you to record them!

*Target the Automata Species"

"またまたきちゃいました、ハロウィン！
今年もパーティを開くため、アークスの
みなさんのお力をお借りしちゃいます！
そこで、さっそく貴方にお願いがあるのっ！
今年は仮装だけにのみならず
ちょっと動きなんかにもこだわりたくて
貴方には、あるエネミーの行動を
記録してきて欲しいのっ！

※機甲種が対象"
